Package ayuda.conmigo.Dao

Class NgoDao

java.lang.Object
ayuda.conmigo.Dao.Conexion
ayuda.conmigo.Dao.NgoDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<NgoEnt,String>
public class NgoDao extends Conexion implements DAO<NgoEnt,String>
The class extends connection and implements the DAO interface that contains by default the most used functions in accessing the database. Use an object of type NgoEnt
